item.title: Selfhosting: Caprover versus Cloudron
item.description: Caveat: I've been using Caprover for close to two years now and haven't had any trouble. I haven't used cloudron but have been considering it as a Caprover alternative. My top two reasons to look for alternatives. - Automatic backups for all apps. If my...

item.title: Baserow self hosting

item.title: Making Computers Personal Again
item.description: The computer stopped being personal. Most of the apps I use on my computer today is on the browser. The data I create and view just rests somewhere else. It's anything but personal. Even development is moving to the cloud with @replit and @glitch What's...
